title: Turkey crown with orange
description: Mary Berry shows you how to cook a turkey crown - deliciously flavoured with orange and thyme - in 10 easy steps.This meal, if served as 10 portions, provides 335kcal, 56g protein,	7g carbohydrate (of which 3.5g sugars), 8g fat (of which 4g saturates), 0.4g fibre and 0.9g salt per portion.
ingredients: 2 small oranges, one thinly sliced, one cut in half
450ml/¾ pint hot turkey or chicken stock
salt and freshly ground black pepper
